sentences: Ma näitan teile kõiki oma kodu.
Tema ei taha näidata oma valu.
context: The word 'näitan' is the first-person singular present tense form of the Estonian verb 'näitama', which means 'to show'. It is used when the speaker wants to indicate that they are showing something to someone else. The word follows Estonian conjugation patterns and belongs to the -ma verb class.
